review: Might just be the greatest thing ever invented.  If I can figure it out...anybody can.  Connected right away to home WiFi and I downloaded the Fire TV stick app to my phone and was using voice commands to search what I wanted to watch.  I think they made it very user friendly and highly recommend this as an alternative to additional cable TV add-on channels that are usually costly.  Very pleased with Amazon Prime overall, but this was the icing on the cake.
author: Jeff McCullough

review: Setup is straightforward - quick and easy.  Works flawlessly on a 32-inch Samsung LED flat screen, on our wireless home network.  There are a lot of apps available, although Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Vudu are the only ones that we currently use.  The compact-sized remote control works well, and conveniently fits in the palm of your hand. Streaming is so much more convenient than discs.  The Fire TV Stick is perfect for our needs, and we will probably purchase 1 or 2 more in the near future.  If you're streaming and need something new or better, the Fire TV Stick is the ticket.
author: Marie
